Articles.Content: Whaaaattttt? Not having super microscopic vision? Um...exc-...excuse me si-...sir, that is cheating. Everyone good non-cheater possesses super microscopic vision for cases like these.

If you are not posting on Earth, you are cheating, CHEATER!

(This is really moot, as EVERYBODY is posting on Earth right now.)

Actually.....I'm posting from my computer chair, which is sitting on my linoleum floor, which is on the wood floor under it, which is on the ceiling of the basement...so technically I am not posting "on earth." Technically speaking, the earth is under my basement.

Not being technical? My goodness. Do we have a cheater over here. Real players always get technical, to find and also avoid loopholes.
Erg... anyway, your location isn't true. Cheaters can't be in one place and in another at the same time.
Living in California? HAAAAAAAAX!
Cactuses are not only growing in Deserts. They Grow in Tundras too! Chetaar!
Uh...Chetaar? Looked it up...No definition. Using words that don't exist, that is some thoughtless cheating right there. Everyone knows that in order to not cheat, you must use words that exist.
Not accepting alternate spellings on the Internet? Good luck with that, cheddar. Real Internet denizens ignore spelling and focus on intended meaning instead.

Ch....cheddar? I see no reason to call somebody a type of cheese, unless....you're a cheater! Cheese is for wallace, not regular internet folk.

anyone get the reference?
Myspacebarisstuckbecauseyoureferencedsomething?CHEATER!Realplayersalwaysmakeunderstandablereferences!waitasecond,myspacebarisglitching.Itsflickeringonand o ffff o n o its mes sed u p
Clearly you use your spacebar too much. That, my friend, is cheating! Real players never overuse their spacebar to the point it breaks and then blame the previous poster.

Aha, caught you red handed! Cheating! He didn't overuse his space bar! It really was because of my reference! [deepvillianlaugh]Mwahahahahaha![/deepvillianlaugh] Non-cheaters never speculate as to the causes of keyboard failures!

Cacti don't have red hands for you to catch, you cheater!

Edited August 22, 2014 by Colserra3
derpness
You edited that post for "derpness", cheater!
location near me? Cheating! Call the kraken police to rip apart this cheaters jool mission! All good players keep their distance. 0_0
Keeping other players away from you? You must not want them to smell the stink of cheating that surrounds you! Real KSPers don't mind seeing other players in real life.

How did you get so much reputation? By cheating?

(Keep it civil, guys, this is not a thread filled with ruckuses.)

First off, everyone here knows everyone else is joking. If something offends someone, i'm sorry. But it is a game about finding reasons to call someone a cheater. And, its a game. Its alright to not be civil to some degree.

Not abiding by all the rules on the main page? cheater-book cheating right there. Read the rules, man, its what all good non-cheaters do!
Peacemaking in a reasonable tone? Clear violation of Newton's Law of the Internet, cheater. Every online action has an opposite overreaction.
Over-expectation, cheater.
How DARE you doubt Newton! Only cheaters would commit such heresy!
Saying the words used by the government in 1610 against Galileo? Cheating!
Claiming that Galileo could ever be slowed down? WITCHCRAFT! Every non-witchcrafter knows that Galileo is da boss, and should he lived to today, we would all be on a huge megametropolis on Venus!
Obsession with Venus? CHEATER!
Trolling everybody just by using your signature CHEATER Real players always dont troll and always use punctuation
